changeSet.author: ben
ben
changeSet.sql: call populateDate();

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: update Content left join Content_Authority on (Content.id = Content_Authority.Content_id) set authority_id = Content_Authority.authorities_id where Content_Authority.authorities_KEY = 0;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: update Distribution left join Distribution_Authority on (Distribution.id = Distribution_Authority.Distribution_id) set authority_id = Distribution_Authority.authorities_id where Distribution_Authority.authorities_KEY = 0;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: update Image left join Image_Authority on (Image.id = Image_Authority.Image_id) set authority_id = Image_Authority.authorities_id where Image_Authority.authorities_KEY = 0;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: update Reference left join Reference_Authority on (Reference.id = Reference_Authority.Reference_id) set authority_id = Reference_Authority.authorities_id where Reference_Authority.authorities_KEY = 0;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: update Taxon left join Taxon_Authority on (Taxon.id = Taxon_Authority.Taxon_id) set authority_id = Taxon_Authority.authorities_id where Taxon_Authority.authorities_KEY = 0;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: update Annotation set identifier = UUID() where identifier is null

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE BATCH_JOB_PARAMS SET STRING_VAL = "WCS" WHERE STRING_VAL = "1";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET recordType = annotatedObjType;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET annotatedObjType = NULL where annotatedObjId is NULL;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET value = code where code in ("rank","related");

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET value = substring(text,40) where code = "UNEXPECTEDTAXONEXCEPTION";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET value = substring(substring(text,7),1,instr(substring(text,7)," ")) where code = "TAXONALREADYPROCESSEDEXCEPTION";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET value = substring(text,37) where code = "CANNOTFINDRECORDEXCEPTION";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET code = "BadField" where code in ("rank","related");

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET code = "Update" WHERE code = "Updated";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET code = "Create" WHERE code = "Created";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET code = "Unexpected" WHERE code = "UNEXPECTEDTAXONEXCEPTION";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET code = "BadIdentifier" WHERE code = "CANNOTFINDRECORDEXCEPTION";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET code = "BadRecord" WHERE code = "FlatFileParseException";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET code = "Present" WHERE type = "Present";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET code = "Absent" WHERE type = "Absent";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET type = "Info" WHERE type = "Create";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET type = "Info" WHERE type = "Update";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET type = "Info" WHERE type = "Present";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET type = "Warn" WHERE type = "Absent";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET type = "Warn" WHERE type = "Unexpected";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Annotation SET code = "AlreadyProcessed" WHERE code = "TAXONALREADYPROCESSEDEXCEPTION";

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Taxon join Taxon_Image on (Taxon.id = Taxon_Image.Taxon_id) SET Taxon.image_id = Taxon_Image.images_id;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: Update Annotation set recordType = "Taxon" where recordType is NULL;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Taxon SET Taxon.accepted_id = NULL where Taxon.accepted_id = Taxon.id;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Taxon SET Taxon.status = 'accepted' where Taxon.accepted_id is null;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Taxon SET Taxon.status = 'synonym' where Taxon.accepted_id is not null;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Taxon SET Taxon.parent_id = NULL where Taxon.accepted_id is not NULL;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Image SET Image.format = 'jpg';

changeSet.sql: update Taxon join Reference on (Taxon.namePublishedIn_id = Reference.id) set namePublishedInString = concat(Reference.title,IFNULL(Reference.volume,''),IFNULL(Taxon.protologueMicroReference,''),IFNULL(Reference.datePublished,''));

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.comment: Noticed that the OAI-PMH processor wasn't adding authority to the reference
changeSet.sql: update Reference set authority_id = 1 where authority_id is NULL;

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.comment: BUG #368: Align the e-monocot model with the DwC standard

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.comment: BUG #368: Align the e-monocot model with the DwC standard
changeSet.sql: update Reference set bibliographicCitation = concat(ifnull(Reference.author,''), if(datePublished is not NULL, datePublished,''), '. ', ifnull(title,''), if(publishedInAuthor is not NULL,concat(' ',publishedInAuthor),''), if(publishedIn is not NULL,concat(' ',publishedIn),''), if(volume is not NULL,concat(' ',volume),''), if(pages is not NULL,concat(': ',pages),''), ' ', if(publisher is not NULL,concat(publisher,'.'),'')) where authority_id = 1

changeSet.comment: OAI-PMH webservice did not set the authority for distributions
changeSet.sql: update distribution set authority_id = 1 where authority_id is NULL;
